item.title: Patch Notes | 1.19 Pre-Release 4
item.description: Patch Notes | 1.19 Pre-Release 4 1.19 Pre-Release 4 The fourth pre-release for 1.19 is now available with a few bugfixes. In case you missed it, we just announced the release date for The Wild Update (June 7th). You can read more about that here. Fixed Bugs MC-220067 - Chunk corruption with command block full of certain Unicode characters. MC-245504 - Touchscreen mode crash // java.lang.ClassCastException: class eec$a cannot be cast to class eec$c (eec$a and eec$c are in unnamed module of loader ‘app’).

Rays Works Minecraft NEWS: 1.19 Pre 5, Mojang Dev Leaves, Leaks
